text:
Created attachment 23064
Patch adding the missing SVN properties on project's root

SVN bugtraq properties may be helpful to link commits with issue ids and are supported by different SVN clients.
See:
http://markphip.blogspot.com/2007/01/integrating-subversion-with-your-issue.html
creator: mguillemot@yahoo.fr

text: Added for Tomcat trunk. It is proves useful, it will get added to 6.0.x and 5.5.x.
creator: markt@apache.org
